name: One Quote A Day
description:
CONTROLS: (this game was made with controller in mind)

Mouse/keyboard:

- WASD: Move around

- Mouse: Look around

- Space: Flip a quote

- Shift: carry an excerpt

Controller:

- Left joystick: Move around

- Right joystick: Look around

- X: Flip a quote

- Right trigger: carry an excerpt

A game covering quotes, where each quote provides a unique experience, that's the challenge I put in front of me, the one I chose to chase.

As I only had two weeks for this school assignment, I had important decisions to make related to its scope:

- I focused on one quote, leading to one minigame

- I would go wild with it

I hope you enjoy what you see. If you do, feel free to follow me on itch!
